website_summaries.verdict: If you get one that works as it should, chances are you will be impressed with the functions and acoustics. But the known issues that some owners have had are concerning.
pros: Handsome round design looks great in boats
Compatible with numerous devices including iPods and MP3 players
cons: Issues with some of the control buttons failing have been reported

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these. One failed pretty quickly and JBL refused to repair it. I do not plan to purchase any of their products ever again. The people at JBL delay and deny and fail to make their products last even just the warranty period. Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.author: J. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Worst marine radio ever!
customer_reviews.text: i will never buy another JBL product ever again.. Radio stopped working, impossible customer service for this product, gets extremely hot, Bluetooth is spotty, not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Mason K Madison

customer_reviews.title: wont last long
customer_reviews.text: we have bought a bunch of these, really like the little space and ease of mounting and hook up sounds good too Problem is and reason we bought so many of these, besides we have a few boats. Mainly they only last a year or two. We keep our boats inside and the installations are dry and well vented. Just lost another that lasted under 2 years Think I am giving up on this PRV 175 JBL
customer_reviews.author: daboatcaptian

customer_reviews.title: Lolve it
customer_reviews.text: Well, I like it, not, you know, Love. It is a good stereo with some nice features. Mine is paired with some JBL speakers mounted on the side of my center console. They sound nice. Now I just pair the Blue thing with my cell and listen to the Blues on my Amazon playlist. Somebody mentioned that it gets hot but I would call it warm as what you are touching is the heat-sink for the amplifier. A watt is a watt is a watt. I don't see it as a problem. Easy to install, easy to use, nice sound, and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Quarles

customer_reviews.title: Just installed the radio this past weekend in our Yamaha ...
customer_reviews.text: Just installed the radio this past weekend in our Yamaha Rhino. The radio is very compact, which is well suited to the small area behind the dash panel. The radio connections were labeled and pre-stripped which made my work soldering much quicker. I can't comment on the waterproof nature of the radio yet, but rest assured it will be tested. The only negative I have encountered thus far is that when power is removed from the radio and then re-applied, the radio will not automatically power back on. I had planned on wiring the radio to the ignition switch. So basically, you have to press the JBL power button every time. Not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboyzak

customer_reviews.title: jbl / boss comparison
customer_reviews.text: Nice look, but has many disadvantages... 1. There is no equalizer or speaker adjusting this produces a flat sound. 2. No clock 3. Mounting can be challenging. Has 3.5 inch hole. I purchased the boss gauge style unit and returned it due to condensation but boy did it pack a punch compared to jbl. The boss sound is far superior and even has a amp botton for more power. Just wish I could get a quality product. I guess I'll try the kicker or clarion next. However the buttons on the jbl are easier to press with more response than the boss. I also sell the cheapest and best Ttops, Bimini, wakeboard towers in Texas. See last photo.
customer_reviews.author: Hulk33

customer_reviews.title: Hot and Static Bluetooth Reception
customer_reviews.text: Kind of upset with this JBL product since I use A LOT of their electronics. The radio gets extremely hot after 15+ mins of use in will ventilated area. Im guessing the heat affects the bluetooth audio quality because it causes more and more static in the speakers. I gave it 2 stars because everything else functions fine.
customer_reviews.author: PV Turner

customer_reviews.title: Working great since 2014
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a similar style very cheap radio and have been extremely happy. Bluetooth works well. Sound is great. I am using 4 6-1/2 inch Kenwood speakers powered by this head and 2 more 6-1/2 speakers powered via an amp through the rca outputs on the head. 19 foot fish/ski. I'm about to add another amp and sub. The unit does get very hot but only on the backside and also around the thin metal ring in front of the supplied mounting gasket and behind the radio face but not a problem so far. Maybe I got lucky but it has been working great.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: This product failed three days after 30 day return policy. The forward skip button does not work. I have bought this before and if i cant return this item for a new one i will no longer buy for my customers
customer_reviews.author: emilee smith

customer_reviews.title: ALWAYS READ the negative reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after about 3 uses. Re-checked wiring, etc. Of course, its past any return date, and given the other negative reviews its not worth my time to try and contact customer service. ALWAYS READ THE NEGATIVE REVIEWS so you know what you could be getting yourself into. Very dissapointed that a "good name" like JBL would put out crap like this.
customer_reviews.author: Roving Blue, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Great sound in a small package. Installed perfectly in my boat dashboard. I'm using this unit along with a JBL 4 chan amp, and 4 JBL marine speakers. Total sound quality was far above expectations for the cost of the complete system. Bluetooth connection is very clear, and easy set up. Display is easy to read, and control layout is very functional. Great design. Highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: R Hochhalter

customer_reviews.title: Buttons stuck first use
customer_reviews.text: Buttons broke first time use. It survived under a year and I bought another the same just not to mess my boat up. The second one is working better. Problems with the Aux/Bluetooth with iphones, very low volume. Nit the connections....
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio but it gets awefully hot.
customer_reviews.text: The radio works great. Picks up Bluetooth immediately, has a decent startup time, and has awesome sound quality. I can only give it 4 stars due to the fact that this thing gets so hot it could burn you if you touch the back. Do not enclose the back side, it needs air to flow around it. Mine shut down due to heat without the back open, I'm sure triple digit South Louisiana heat didn't help it any either.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: The only affordable marine Stereo to buy.
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my 1967 MGBGT because I didn't want to punch out the punch out on the dash and installed next to the passengers leg area next to the center console. I have an iPhone SE with iOS 10.3.2 and every function and app works flawlessly. Google music, pandora, being able to skip tracks from the unit instead of my phone makes for safe driving. I couldn't be any happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JJB

customer_reviews.title: It's not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more because it was JBL and not a knock off. The bluetooth range is maybe 5 feet. It doesn't put out much power to the speakers. The rca output is only 2 volts. I wouldn't buy it again. It's maybe as good as the economy brands.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Much better than regular DIN radio units
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a Boat cockpit. Much better than regular DIN radio units. Control is not so intuitive and not much info when controlling USB pen drives (access is only by file per file system. No folders selection) Good sound quality. Installation is simple, but the it could have a better fixing system with a back screw (like other boats instruments) instead of a pin. Since de boat panel is very deep, I could not reach something to anchor the back pin, and had to use silicon glue to hold it in place. Overall its still much better than din units.
customer_reviews.author: Claudio Martinelli Murta

customer_reviews.title: Great for replacing bulky CD player receivers
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound and power for the price. Great for replacing bulky CD player receivers. Mounted next to driver's seat. Bluetooth range seems a little short, but the source device is obviously in the boat anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Big A

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit... a bargain at twice the price !
customer_reviews.text: This is the second JBL PRV-175 unit i bought. You can hook the speakers directly to the unit or run it to an amp and crank up the sound. My 17 foot flats boat has a direct speaker set up to the unit and it's fine .My larger boat has an JBL marine amp amp and the sound is awesome. One little point to remember.. when you hook up an amp you need to connect the blue "remote" wire to the amp this turns the amp on.
customer_reviews.author: Vero Beach

customer_reviews.title: No durability
customer_reviews.text: Junk. My first one after a year would no longer hook to my phone. Ordered another that lasted a little over a year before it started shutting off and restarting every 30 seconds. The aftermarket warranty thankfully covered the last one. Expect way better from JBL. Obviously going another direction. I will say it was good when it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Works ok for a while.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a while. This is the second unit I've had go bad. The first one after about 8 months. The current one after just over a year and out of warranty. Installed properly on my flats boat which is garage kept. Now I am left with a large gauge hole in my console.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany G

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my boat and in less than 3 months quit working. It may be the switch since it became increasingly harder to power on then stopped powering on completely. Contacted Prospec and since I purchased on Amazon by non authorized reseller no help. If you choose to purchase be sure to check seller and warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good unit... not recommended for spa.. unless you prep it properly.
customer_reviews.text: Good little unit. Runs blazing hot. Bluetooth range is only a few feet.. which is ok. I used this in my spa and the trim ring corroded instantly. if you install this in your spa I recommend spraying clear coat on the trim ring prior to install. Otherwise nice unit. The chrome is applied to a plastic substrate and it is almost done being eaten away... I will just leave it white plastic once it is all corroded away. This process has taken two months... my spa uses ozonator and no chlorine fyi.
customer_reviews.author: ross jackson

customer_reviews.title: Bought this thinking JBL was a premium brand and worth ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking JBL was a premium brand and worth a little more then the off brands. Replaced my existing boat stereo. As soon as I turned up the volume 1. It didn't get very loud. 2 it cut out once volume reached level 30.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this and it worked the first and second time ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this and it worked the first and second time we used it. The some of the buttons stopped working on it. Way over priced for a non quality product. Sound is ok but the buttons going out leaves you with a radio you can not search through songs or change channels on.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: put this in your surplus army trucks
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my old army truck where space is very limited and with a bi metal hole saw...... and presto I now have the perfect size and only radio that will fit almost like factory with very few mods had to move the headlight and jake brake switches down a bit after having no tunes for six months to being thoroughly entertained awesome !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas P.

customer_reviews.title: A great item at a very good cost
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on my UTV. A great item at a very good cost. Bluetooth works well up to about 20-25 feet away. Programming and setup will definately require reading the instructions to get the right buttons combination, but once done works great. Note that installing a power on-off switch is a must or it will drain the battery after a few days of sitting. Memory loss not a problem with power off since it has an internal eprom to store settings.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great! Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works great! Easy to install. The only problem is, the radio gets HOT when we use it. I don't know if that's a problem...it keeps working. All the features and functions work, and the antenna works great for reception on our up north lake!
customer_reviews.author: Elissa Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed so far - higher expectations from JBL.
customer_reviews.text: My first radio was defective on arrival - constantly cycled through "Welcome" only to be followed by "Good Bye" when powered on. Reset did not help. Returned to Amazon without issue. Ordered the identical model since I had already drilled a mounting hole and soldered my wiring harness together. The second one worked. The bluetooth range seems weak. The boat is only 17 feet long and the radio drops the connection to an iPhone when on the bow of the boat. That is pretty lame considering the console is in the center of the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: As represented works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great no issues after a year, I do keep it covered so that may help with the lens condensate issues listed in other reviews
customer_reviews.author: Sean M

customer_reviews.title: Works great. My only issue with it is the bluetooth ...
customer_reviews.text: I have this installed on my boat. Works great. My only issue with it is the bluetooth connection, it starts to sputter just walking around the boat with my phone in my pocket. I mean even being 10 feet away from the receiver will start to cut out.
customer_reviews.author: Nadeem

customer_reviews.title: Awesome design. Bluetooth works great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome design. Bluetooth works great. Doesn't get really hot like some people had said. It is very simple and responsive. Don't know how to dim when it's night out though, just bought the cap for now. Besides that, awesome unit.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my pioneer 500 utv. Love the usb port
customer_reviews.author: Doug Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Worst stereo head unit I have ever purchased!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this product to anyone. Installed stereo in my boat in a covered garage, played it one time while in garage and the output channels for the speakers no longer work. Have tried several different speakers, no change. Head unit powers up fine, Bluetooth connects like it's supposed to but no speaker output. Even on the am/fm radio feature--no output.
customer_reviews.author: jacelyn

customer_reviews.title: PRV 175 Not what I expected. "Do not recommend"
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for about 30 minutes and stopped working. Just displays Welcome then Goodbye over and over on screen no other functions/buttons work at all and will not shut off. I had a Jensen MS30 on my last boat no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will sound best with an amp
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a RZR 800s. I fabricated a little mount and put it under the dash. My biggest complaint is that you cant dim the LED display. I put some Velcro on the sides and just cover that part up. Works with no amp but I'm installing one anyway to also power a small sub. Will sound best with an amp.
customer_reviews.author: KenW

customer_reviews.title: Did not even last a year. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Installed and used for maybe half a summer and it won’t work.
customer_reviews.author: dm

customer_reviews.title: They make great products for boats
customer_reviews.text: I am a tried and true JBL fan. They make great products for boats. I wish there was better tech support for the product, I am hooking this unit up to an AMP but it does not clearly show how that is supposed to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: This is a great radio system. Easy to mount using a hole saw. With its built in antenna it can pick up local stations well, but I would get a pole antenna for long distance. Blue tooth works great with my iPhone. Easy to wire in and sounds great with mid range price speakers. Yes, I would buy this radio again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Big Sound... Small Sexy Package!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't hesitate to purchase this product, big things do come in small packages. Works flawlessly so far and very impressed with ease of installation, available features/outputs/inputs. Only time will tell if stands the test of time in the harsh coastal environment but considering how it feels, looks & sounds paired with JBL's MS6200 2-way 6-1/2" marine rated speakers I would gladly buy again and refer this gauge mount head unit/receiver to others.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and mount, plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit for those hard to fit areas. I mounted this in a panel on the outside of my RV for outdoor sound. I used this, the Infinity Basslink 200, and the Yamaha NS-AW350-B speakers for a killer setup. This thing powered the Yamahas great. BT range is a bit short...
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Jim

customer_reviews.title: The right search button stopped working after about a hour ...
customer_reviews.text: The right search button stopped working after about a hour of use. Everything else seemed to work properly. This is installed on a fishing boat. If im fighting with the sterio, I'm not fishing.
customer_reviews.author: kevin fournier

customer_reviews.title: Poor after sale service by seller
customer_reviews.text: Forward and reverse skip buttons both stopped working within a month. Seller said to contact JBL directly. That's poor customer service in my opinion. Would be a nice little unit otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Big Smooth

customer_reviews.title: Never worked!
customer_reviews.text: Had this professionally installed last summer on our boat and it never worked right. It won't stay on. We just took it back to the installer and he said the unit is bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly works as advertised. Bluetooth is phenomenal and seems ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly works as advertised. Bluetooth is phenomenal and seems to be very waterproof so far. I cut this into my motorcycle fairing that see's water frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Speedman

customer_reviews.title: Great Stereo For Our Skiff
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great, only down side it will not work w/ IPOD USB 16 pin connector. True test will be how it handle the summer weather.
customer_reviews.author: plummer.mx

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking product, but that is all. This unit worked for all 1 trip in our boat, and never worked again. All connections and power were checked, and all worked. The radio was installed by a marine specialist.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Busch

customer_reviews.title: great product. installed it on my boat it works ...
customer_reviews.text: great product. installed it on my boat it works great and a lot cleaner look than normal stereos hooks to my phone via blue tooth fast and great sound
customer_reviews.author: copperman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: better then expected!, clear, loud, and its been drenched by a storm with no issues
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: Awesome radio, not problems at all with install
customer_reviews.text: Awesome radio, not problems at all with install, electrical connections or bluetooth connectivity. The harness from this radio plugged right into the harness on my 2011 Bennington pontoon.
customer_reviews.author: Russell W. Schell

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Crap the harness don’t match up luckily I could splice it together then the mounting bolts are 2 short would definitely safe the time and buy something else next time looks to be refurbished also but did not say it when I purchased
customer_reviews.author: Bennie Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and fits in my MPH gauge location
customer_reviews.text: Radio and Bluetooth work perfect and fits perfectly in my MPH gauge. Since I use my GPS / Fishfinder as my MPH this works out great as I do not have to cut a hole in the console. My only dislike was the wiring instructions were very vague. I was able to figure it out as the wires are clearly marked and I have installed radios in the past. If you do not know any wiring basics or radio installation you may want to do some research prior to installation.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Great sound quality and good sound power
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Great sound quality and good sound power, easy to operate, I just don't see how to jump from one folder to the other when using a pen drive connected at the aux.input. It is necessary to jump track by track untill to get to the desired file....
customer_reviews.author: Carlos S.

customer_reviews.title: What a great little head unit
customer_reviews.text: What a great little head unit. I installed it in a completely open boat and its exposed to the elements ( rain, snow) and it functions perfect. I have a gps unit so I replaced my speedo with this unit. Install took less than 1/2 hour. Great price. Great sound. I added a 4 channel amp to it and now my fishing/ hunting boat rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Birdhunter

customer_reviews.title: Great head unit!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! Works great in my boat. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: You are unable to set you own preset stations. ...
customer_reviews.text: You are unable to set you own preset stations. The stereo chooses which six it wants for each band, and even those are not consistent. Did not try BT or ipod connection. Being a sealed unit it does get a bit hot when in use. Am returning this unit and will try a Dual MGH 20, same price range with a lot more features.
customer_reviews.author: jim tully

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my sxs and absolutely love it. Have had zero issues and it has been hit with the pressure washer many times. I do wish the Bluetooth range was better.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Wellington

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than two years.
customer_reviews.text: Updated - Was an Awesome marine stereo. Easy to install with a hole saw. Looks great and modern. Puts out enough sound/volume with two speakers to listen to music while the yamaha 4 stroke is pushing us across the water to our fishing locations. Stopped working in less than two years. Will replace with another brand and stay away from jbl in the future. Disappointed in the durability. Always under cover.
customer_reviews.author: J spaniard

customer_reviews.title: it keeps memory well and puts out some good sound. Fit right into the speedo spot so ...
customer_reviews.text: Gets a little hot when running but other than that, it keeps memory well and puts out some good sound. Fit right into the speedo spot so I did not need to drill a hole for it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad The Handyman

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this radio 3 months ago and all of a sudden it stopped working checked and make sure I was getting power to the unit and I am so it's the unit itself the company doesn't provide any contact information at all for me to contact them, not a happy customer
customer_reviews.author: brandon balan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome that's all I can say works great, looks great perfect boat radio.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: Good features/function
customer_reviews.text: TBD...so far so good... My one concern is that it (the unit) seems to run a bit hot... Given the excess heat, I am concerned that it may not last long...
customer_reviews.author: houston-h20

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The forward and back buttons stopped working in less then 6 months. I ordered two, one for me and one for a friend. Both radios did the same thing around the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tunes
customer_reviews.text: Works really well!!! Wish the bass/treble was adjustable, and wish it had 2 amp outputs like regular decks, I was powering my 6x9 speakers from the amp otherwise, its great.
customer_reviews.author: tailgator

customer_reviews.title: the product does not match the description
customer_reviews.text: I need a color like the description brilliant And you sent me black the product does not match the description
customer_reviews.author: Ruslan Tatarchenko

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this receiver
customer_reviews.text: Gets extremely hot. Would not work with an additional amp, overheating problems. Had it for about 6 months before it just stopped working completely. I would not recommend this receiver.

customer_reviews.title: Great price foe a great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install sound quality is improved from the original in the boat and now with Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo for my center console boat
customer_reviews.text: Great stereo for my center console boat. Easy to install and bluetooth setup was a breeze. The real test will be how long it will last
customer_reviews.author: Nosey Bitches

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, and looks good.  Decent sound.
customer_reviews.text: Reception isn't great on the FM, but the bluetooth is what I bought it for, and that works perfectly. If you want ANY power to your speakers, get an amp.
customer_reviews.author: LNSJR

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit
customer_reviews.text: Custom install on Jetski. Good sound and very waterproof so far!
customer_reviews.author: S from Ga

customer_reviews.title: looks great, works great
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this radio rocks. looks great, works great. great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Works almost as good as expected but doesn't read the file folders on ...
customer_reviews.text: Works almost as good as expected but doesn't read the file folders on the USB drive as I like to group my music in folders and a certain sequence. All of my other USB stereos allow this.
customer_reviews.author: Mariner52

customer_reviews.title: I love that this replaced my speedometer
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a little heat so far from unit but nothing seems out of the ordinary for a unit that pushes power to speakers in such a small package. I love that this replaced my speedometer, as my boat only goes 30 mph. Was able to sell speedometer to help cover costs.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Just hooked it up on boat a few days ago ...
customer_reviews.text: Just hooked it up on boat a few days ago, really liking the bluetooth option which allows for endless types of music.
customer_reviews.author: Roger R

customer_reviews.title: Freekin Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Freekin wow!! This thing is sweeeeet!! Good price, great product...life is gonna get a whole lot better on the water with this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Had it 3 years, no issues sounds great. Wish I was iPhone compatable on Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth streaming in the boat is great. The radio sticks out of the dash probably ...
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth streaming in the boat is great. The radio sticks out of the dash probably close to an inch. I expected it to be more of a flush, clean looking install. Not a huge deal to me but might be to some. I did have an issue with mine and had to deal with JBL "customer service". I ended up dealing with the issue myself because I was tired of dealing with the run around I was getting from JBL. If I were to buy another one I would probably go with a different brand because of JBL's poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Ben H.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Returned one. Now on my 2nd one so we'll see!
customer_reviews.author: Jzim2448

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good amp for such a small unit. Woks great! Easy to install as well...
customer_reviews.author: euro

customer_reviews.title: All well and good for 2 trips out on boat then it crapped out
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound but get a amp not a lot of power out of this unit , takes a 31/2" hole and mounts 2.75 deep , I bought a Jensen and returned it since it was twice the depth , And it gets all local channels on fm with no anntenna . No power good fuse just got hot and quit . #pissednow
customer_reviews.author: Tim C

customer_reviews.title: New model is great!
customer_reviews.text: First one didn't work but was able to exchange. New model is great!
customer_reviews.author: rlarse

customer_reviews.title: Great But Gets Very Hot
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little unit. Great sound but it gets so hot you can't touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray w

customer_reviews.title: Really like this head unit
customer_reviews.text: Really like this head unit!!! Have had it for couple months now, and very happy. Some reviews claim short Bluetooth range, and over heating, have had no such issues, even after playing ALL day long on several boat trips. Connects good to Bluetooth, has decent sound and easy to operate, I would recommend it. Gave it only four stars for low sound output (even though ya can't expect to much out of such a small package), and streaming on Bluetooth the volume is considerably lower than FM or usb, you have to really crank it up, not really an issue but shouldn't be like that, no other complaints, great unit for simple, clean stereo on my boat.
customer_reviews.author: T.H.E. Shop

customer_reviews.title: installed it in my navpod this is really cool going to buy another one for the dinghy
customer_reviews.text: installed it in my navpod this is really cool going to buy another one for the dinghy .I cant believe how cheap it is some of the remotes are are almost as expensive. they should include the sun cover.
customer_reviews.author: daniel b.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, Bluetooth is somewhat sensitive to phone location but works well enough
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: It's cool and convenient but gets BURNING HOT and its melting ...
customer_reviews.text: It's cool and convenient but gets BURNING HOT and its melting my dash. It will burn your finger. Sucks because I already paid to have it installed!
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect were old Lowrance depth finder was in dash
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect were old Lowrance depth finder was in dash. Have not had it on the water yet. Sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Lasted for about a year-and-a-half and rear channel is blown.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! I can't see why anyone would want a CD player or anything different on a boat than this! Takes up minimal room, hooked up to 2 JL audio 6's and sounds pretty good In a small flatboat for not having an amp.
customer_reviews.author: mike vereen

customer_reviews.title: Buttons stop working
customer_reviews.text: This radio worked great for about 6 months, then the forward and back buttons both stopped working. Contacted manufacturer - they will not honor warranty if purchased on Amazon. Buyer beware, not the JBL we all grew up with. This is a knock off brand made in China.
customer_reviews.author: James D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really a cool radio, needs to be hooked up to an amp. Otherwise it gets to hot.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loooooove it. Installed on my 2015 rzr with 2 marine tower speakers and a marine amp. Love love love this unit
customer_reviews.author: Bozoman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money it works great, and you can hose it down without having any water issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my gold cart
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my gold cart. Installed it and added a Pyle Subwoofer and Pyle pro speakers and it sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Dman

customer_reviews.title: Not to happy with this one
customer_reviews.text: Bought this radio, hooked it up, used it 3 times & one of the buttons that changes the song stopped working. 2 days later the other button that changes the song has stopped working. Not to happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: amy pack

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the scan up scan down buttons stop working on my 3rd one now
customer_reviews.author: Mike Milanese

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at how much I like it
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised by this little head unit. I have two Sony 6.5" in my bass boat and it is perfect. I thought I might need to add a amp, but nope, just enough. Fit perfectly were my old Humminbird depth finder was located on my console.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Perdue

customer_reviews.title: This thing I'd awesome. I installed it in my artic cat side ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing I'd awesome. I installed it in my artic cat side by side. Easy installation and looks amazing. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cash Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best radio for a boat I've seen yet
customer_reviews.text: Best radio for a boat I've seen yet. Bluetooth works flawlessly, radio has great sound and is really easy to use. No problems seeing the display in direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: D. Polk

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unit sounds good but the Bluetooth function quit working within 4 months of installation
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great mounted in my rzr
customer_reviews.text: Looks great mounted in my rzr. Bluetooth works great, I've used it up to around 20' away from it and still connected. Able to control songs right there from the unit so no need to keep my phone in harms way, displays the song title which I like. Very easy to use and navigate. Plenty of hook ups for 4 speakers and I run 2 amps off it as well. It's been completely submerged while on and still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Chad meadows

product_meta.title: Prospec Electronics JBL-PRV175 Jbl Am/Fm/Bt/USB 4X45 Stereo
product_meta.description: Today, Prospec Electronics manufactures and distributes some of the world’s best-known marine Audio products. A leader in the marine aftermarket, the Mt. Pleasant, South Carolina, company has grown to become a major international supplier, exporting products to clients throughout the world.
